items.title: Santa Rally Loses Steam as Natural Gas Futures Pull Back
items.summary: Natural gas futures retreated during the shortened Christmas Eve session Wednesday, giving back a portion of Tuesday’s outsized gains as weather models trimmed heating demand and traders squared positions ahead of the holiday.

items.title: Cold Weather Returns and Natural Gas Prices Surge
items.summary: U.S. natural gas futures surged the most since late October as one energy trader warned that "winter isn't over," with another wave of cold air set to spill into the eastern half of the Lower 48 early next week. The upcoming cold blast arrives even a
